document.description: a fast food restaurant Halal Bite is nice, clean with a welcoming ... in Camden has become my own kitchen table. I make ... for the growing Asian community in the Mile End ...

Category
Fast Food&Takeaways Halal Chinese Steakhouses …More categories»
More Categories
African Bars Caribbean Coffee&Tea Delis Fish&Chips Food Indian Malaysian Middle Eastern Nightlife Pakistani Restaurants Seafood Search Cancel 1. Halal Bite Category: Fast Food&Takeaways Area: Bethnal Green 2 reviews 169 Mile End Road London E1 4AQ 020 7791 0405 a fast food restaurant Halal Bite is nice, clean with a welcoming atmosphere. I honestly cannot fault this place. With great tasting, cheap fresh food, that is perfect for a filling late lunch, I have to bestow 5*s. 2. North Sea Fish Restaurant Categories: Seafood , Fish&Chips Area: Bloomsbury 46 reviews 7-8 Leigh Street London WC1H 9EW 020 7387 5892 North Sea is the place where I was introduced to a proper Fish and Chips. We managed to catch North Sea minutes before the restaurant opens, which meant a trip right next door to their takeaway. If you're looking 3. Chutney Mary Categories: Indian , Halal Area: West Brompton 16 reviews 535 Kings Road London SW10 0SZ 020 7351 7694 I went to Chutney Mary with a friend during restaurant week earlier this year and it was an absolutely lovely experience. It was pretty quiet for a week night - I believe we went on a Wednesday. The restaurant 4. Rasa Sayang Categories: Malaysian , Chinese Areas: Chinatown , Soho 33 reviews 5 Macclesfield Street London W1D 6AY 020 7734 1382 is a plethora of Thai, Cantonese, Japanese and Vietnamese restaurants around, Malaysian restaurants are comparatively few and scattered around. I used to like Kiasu in Bayswater before it got closed down for reasons… 5. Blue Elephant Category: Thai Areas: West Brompton , Fulham , Fulham Broadway 25 reviews 4-6 Fulham Broadway London SW6 1AA 020 7385 6595 This is one of my favourite restaurants in the UK, certainly my favourite Thai restaurant . The decor here is just stunning, walking into the restaurant over a little footbridge with a pool of koi carp swimming around 6. Guanabana Categories: Caribbean , Halal , Steakhouses Area: Camden Town 6 reviews 85 Kentish Town Road London NW1 8NY 020 7485 1166 thought! I went for dinner there that night and I wasn't disappointed...I even ended up booking my 30th Birthday party there straight away. I love this venue, a cosy, comfortable and friendly restaurant with a great 7. Tayyabs Categories: Indian , Pakistani Area: Whitechapel 153 reviews 83-89 Fieldgate Street London E1 1JU 020 7247 9543 Make a reservation. Otherwise, your experience at Tayyabs will be tainted. The line to get a table is a bit ridiculous--you queue inside the restaurant while miserably watching plates of food being served to seated 8. Noodle Oodle Category: Halal Area: Bayswater 9 reviews 106-110 Queensway London W2 3RR 020 7792 8833 unless you are actually looking for halal food, go to one of the "real" Chinese restaurants down the street. 9. Bosphorus Kebabs Category: Middle Eastern Area: South Kensington 23 reviews 59 Old Brompton Road London SW7 3JS 020 7584 4048 Whenever we visit London we rent an apartment in a different residential neighborhood, and the biggest advantage is discovering restaurants we never would have found if we were staying in a hotel in the heart 10. Satay House Categories: Chinese , Malaysian Area: Paddington 14 reviews 13 Sale Place London W2 1PX 020 7723 6763 This is my favourite "Malay" Malaysian restaurant in London (compared to others e.g. Mawar (now Melur), Naha (now Bonda), Jom Makan, etc). These are different to the "Chinese" Malaysian restaurants (e.g. C&R, Kopitiam 1 to 10 of 486 Go to Page 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 ... Previous | Next Got search feedback? Help us improve. Related Lists
